title: Coronavirus: Zoom under increased scrutiny as popularity soars
description: The New York attorney general has written to the videoconferencing company about its security measures.
content:
Image copyrightGetty Images
The videoconferencing app Zoom has come under fresh high-level scrutiny as its popularity soars during the coronavirus pandemic.
